meanings.definition: Of or relating to the destruction of cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytolytic treatment targeted the harmful cells in the body.
meanings.sent2: The cytolytic substance broke down the infected cells effectively.
meanings.sent3: The cytolytic solution was so powerful that it made the cells disappear like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cytolytic missiles, destroying any hope of reconciliation.
meanings.sent5: The cytolytic effect was like a tiny army attacking and breaking down the enemy cells.

meanings.definition: Causing lysis or dissolution of cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytolytic enzyme broke down the cell walls for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The cytolytic reaction resulted in the breakdown of the cell structure.
meanings.sent3: The cytolytic power of the detergent dissolved the cells completely.
meanings.sent4: His anger was cytolytic, causing the breakdown of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The cytolytic force was like a powerful wave crashing against the cell walls.
